name: echoL1
desc: Picsat receives a message (up to 10 chars) and replies with the same message

name: getL1Hk
desc: Triggers transmission of all l1 HK
param: part of the L1 HK to get (part1 or part2)

name: i2cWriteL1
desc: Use I2C to forward a commad to a subsystem, directly on the I2C address

name: i2cWriteReadL1
desc: Use I2C to forward a commad to a subsystem, directly on the I2C address, then reads I2C after a delay and emits the reply in a telemetry

name: setL1Periods
desc: SetPeriods for HK and processing tasks (zero for no change)

name: getL1Periods
desc: GetPeriods for HK and processing tasks

name: setL1Substates
desc: Set Substates of L1 processes (zero for no change)
param: 1 for no reduction- 2 for reduction- 3 for reduction and direct sending of light version of data
1 to disable UART - 2 for Payload Bootloader - 3 for science
1 to send basic data - 2 to also send science data
1 to use SD Card - 2 to not use SD Card

name: getL1Substates
desc: Get Substates of L1 processes (Processing, UART, DataManagement and SD card processes)

name: clearSchedulerFifo
desc: Clear all data schedule for latter

name: getSchedulerFifo
desc: Trigger downloading of all scheduled data (for verification)
